parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.08

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Locations

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Attaches a location to the specified object. To detach a location, attach it to [[objNull]].

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> location '''attachObject''' object

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> location: [[Location]]
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> object: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>myLocation [[attachObject]] [[player]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[attachedObject]], [[createLocation]]
</value></part></template>
